description: Check that Age (age) is between 18 and 75 years
query_text: Please verify Age. The value is outside the expected range (between 18 and 75 years).

description: Check that Weight (weight) is between 40 and 150 kg
query_text: Please verify Weight. The value is outside the expected range (between 40 and 150 kg).

description: Check that Height (height) is between 140 and 210 cm
query_text: Please verify Height. The value is outside the expected range (between 140 and 210 cm).

description: Check that Systolic Blood Pressure (systolic_bp) is between 90 and 200 mmHg
query_text: Please verify Systolic Blood Pressure. The value is outside the expected range (between 90 and 200 mmHg).

description: Check that Diastolic Blood Pressure (diastolic_bp) is between 50 and 130 mmHg
query_text: Please verify Diastolic Blood Pressure. The value is outside the expected range (between 50 and 130 mmHg).

description: Check that Heart Rate (heart_rate) is between 40 and 150 bpm
query_text: Please verify Heart Rate. The value is outside the expected range (between 40 and 150 bpm).

description: Check that Serum Creatinine (creatinine) is between 0.5 and 3.0 mg/dL
query_text: Please verify Serum Creatinine. The value is outside the expected range (between 0.5 and 3.0 mg/dL).

description: Visit date should be on or after informed consent date
query_text: Please verify the date for Visit Date. Visit date should be on or after informed consent date.

description: Adverse event start date should be on or before end date
query_text: Please verify the date for AE Start Date. Adverse event start date should be on or before end date.

description: If Did Adverse Event Occur is 'Yes', associated details must be provided
query_text: Please provide details for Did Adverse Event Occur as it is marked as 'Yes'.

description: Check that inclusion criteria are met at screening
query_text: Please verify that all inclusion criteria were met. A protocol deviation may have occurred.

description: Check that exclusion criteria are not violated
query_text: Please verify that no exclusion criteria were violated. A protocol deviation may have occurred.

description: Check that visit windows are within protocol-specified ranges
query_text: Please verify the visit date. It appears to be outside the protocol-specified window.

description: Check that prohibited medications were not taken
query_text: Please verify the concomitant medication. It may be prohibited per protocol.

description: Verify systolic BP ≥140 mmHg or diastolic BP ≥90 mmHg at screening (inclusion criteria)
query_text: Please verify blood pressure meets inclusion criteria (SBP ≥140 or DBP ≥90 mmHg).

description: Verify creatinine is within acceptable range per protocol (exclusion criteria)
query_text: Please verify creatinine level. Subjects with creatinine >2.5 mg/dL should be excluded.
